original_text: wearing belts on their waists, with flowing turbans on their heads, all of them having the appearance of officers, a likeness of Babylonians whose native land was Chaldea.
korean_text: 그 형상은 허리를 띠로 동이고 머리를 긴 수건으로 쌌으며 그의 용모는 다 준수한 자 곧 그의 고향 갈대아 바벨론 사람 같은 것이라

sentences.original_text: with flowing turbans on their heads
all of them having the appearance of officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두는 장교 같은 용모를 하고
